name: windswept
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
(of places) open to and not protected from strong winds : We drove down to the windswept Atlantic coast of Portugal.
having hair that is untidy because it has been blown in different directions by the wind: She was looking a bit windswept. windswept hair

(of places) open to and not protected from strong winds: We drove along the windswept coast of Big Sur in Southern California.
